name: ABA Therapy
description: Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) therapy is a scientifically validated approach to understanding and changing behavior. It is commonly used to treat autism.

name: Autism
description: Discover expert insights on autism, including early intervention, therapy options, and family support to help you navigate the challenges and opportunities.

name: Community
description: Connect with a supportive community of parents, caregivers, and professionals who understand the unique joys and challenges of raising a child with autism.

name: Costs & Insurance
description: Navigate the costs associated with autism treatment and learn about insurance coverage options to ensure your child receives the care they need.

name: Health & Care
description: Prioritize your child's overall health and well-being with our expert advice on nutrition, sleep, and medical care for children with autism.

name: Parenting Tips
description: Discover effective parenting tips to support your child with autism, foster their growth, and create a nurturing home environment.
